snippet: The struggling carrier said Friday that it would need to raise more money to build a higher-speed data network.
lead_paragraph: The struggling carrier said Friday that it would need to raise more money to build a higher-speed data network.

headline.main: Sprint’s Shares Fall on News It Lacks Money for Upgrades
headline.print_headline: Sprint’s Shares Fall on News It Lacks Money for Upgrades
headline.seo: Sprint’s Shares Fall on News It Lacks Money for Upgrades
